name: Almost There
description:
CONTROLS:

A-D to turn left-right

SPACE to Jump

Jump over blue bullets to catch them and crash with them into enemies to kill them

You're trying to escape the apocalypse.

We initially thought of naming the game Pas Sage because there is a safe lane where monsters never spawn, but you'll have to go through the unwise (Pas Sage in french) decision of getting out of your way to find the precios Jam that works as your fuel.

Kill all the enemies in the challenge room to get the red key and unlock the red door. On the other side of the passage, salvation is waiting.

If you manage to finish the game, You'll get a hidden secret code to unlock this file:

https://github.com/ANLevant/ExtraCreditsGameJam2019/blob/master/ExtraCreditsGameJam2019/Finish%20the%20game%20and%20crack%20the%20password%20to%20open%20this.rar

Good luck
